text: Ojo [kofiron] ʙa osmonu zamine, ki peşi rū va puşti saraşon ast, nanigaristaand? Agar ʙixohem, ononro [monandi Qorun] dar zamin furū meʙarem jo [hamcun qavmi Şuajʙ] tikkae az osmonro ʙar saraşon meafkanem. Be gumon, dar in [huşdor] ʙaroi har ʙandai tavʙakor, nişonae [az qudrati Alloh taolo] ast
